qas.question: What is the result of the incorporation of independent kingdoms and sultanates?
When did Eritrea join a federation with Ethiopia, the Federation of Ethipia and Eritrea?
What was the result of the War of Independence?
What persisted and led to the Eritrean-Ethiopian War of 1998-2000?
What subsequently led to the Eritran War of Independence?
In what year was the Sultanate of Aussa founded?
In what year did the Eritrean War of Independence start?
Who won the Eritrean-Ethiopian war of 1998-2000?
In what year did Eritrea first skirmish with Djibouti?
In what year did Italian Eritrea get founded?

context: The creation of <a0_0>modern-day <b7_0>Eritrea<b7_0/><a0_0/> is a result of the incorporation of independent, distinct kingdoms and sultanates (for example, Medri Bahri and the Sultanate of Aussa) eventually resulting in the formation of Italian Eritrea. In <a1_0><b5_0><b9_0>1947<b9_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/> Eritrea became part of a federation with Ethiopia, the Federation of Ethiopia and Eritrea. Subsequent <a4_0>annexation<a4_0/> into Ethiopia led to the Eritrean War of Independence, ending with <a2_0>Eritrean independence<a2_0/> following a referendum in April <b6_0>1993<b6_0/>. <a3_0>Hostilities between Eritrea and Ethiopia<a3_0/> persisted, leading to the Eritrean–Ethiopian War of 1998–<b8_0>2000<b8_0/> and further skirmishes with both Djibouti and Ethiopia.
